technical_risks.mitigation: Early submission with buffer time, compliance pre-checks

Auto-scaling policies, additional server capacity on standby

market_risks.contingency: Accelerated marketing spend, unique value proposition emphasis

market_risks.mitigation: Beta testing validation, pre-launch interest building

market_risks.contingency: Rapid response plan, feature improvements, customer outreach
